i5.las2peer.security

Class ServiceAgentImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • i5.las2peer.security.AgentImpl
      • i5.las2peer.security.PassphraseAgentImpl
        • i5.las2peer.security.ServiceAgentImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent, PassphraseAgent, ServiceAgent, MessageReceiver, XmlAble, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ServiceAgentImpl
extends PassphraseAgentImpl
implements ServiceAgent
    A service agent represents a service and its access rights in the las2peer setting.

                                                  java.lang.String passphrase)
                                           throws CryptoException,
                                                  AgentOperationFailedException
        create a completely new ServiceAgent for a given service class the id will be generated randomly
        Parameters:
        service - class name of the new service
        passphrase - a pass phrase for the private key of the agent
        Returns:
        a new ServiceAgent
        Throws:
        CryptoException

                                                              AgentOperationFailedException
        Deprecated. 
        create a ServiceAgent for version 1.0 Can be used to generate ServiceAgent for jUnit tests, since in this case las2peer loads classes using the default class loader and thus does not require version information.
